source.oracleReaderQuery:
select (case when a.fiscal_year_month like 'JAN%' then replace(a.fiscal_year_month,'JAN','FY MONTH 1 -')
             when a.fiscal_year_month like 'FEB%' then replace(a.fiscal_year_month,'JAN','FY MONTH 2 -')
             when a.fiscal_year_month like 'MAR%' then replace(a.fiscal_year_month,'JAN','FY MONTH 3 -')
             when a.fiscal_year_month like 'APR%' then replace(a.fiscal_year_month,'JAN','FY MONTH 4 -')
             when a.fiscal_year_month like 'MAY%' then replace(a.fiscal_year_month,'JAN','FY MONTH 5 -')
             when a.fiscal_year_month like 'JUN%' then replace(a.fiscal_year_month,'JAN','FY MONTH 6 -')
             when a.fiscal_year_month like 'JUL%' then replace(a.fiscal_year_month,'JAN','FY MONTH 7 -')
             when a.fiscal_year_month like 'AUG%' then replace(a.fiscal_year_month,'JAN','FY MONTH 8 -')
             when a.fiscal_year_month like 'SEP%' then replace(a.fiscal_year_month,'JAN','FY MONTH 9 -')
             when a.fiscal_year_month like 'OCT%' then replace(a.fiscal_year_month,'JAN','FY MONTH 10 -')
             when a.fiscal_year_month like 'NOV%' then replace(a.fiscal_year_month,'JAN','FY MONTH 11 -')
             when a.fiscal_year_month like 'DEC%' then replace(a.fiscal_year_month,'JAN','FY MONTH 12 -')
      else '' end) as fiscal_year_month,       
       a.calendar_year_month,
       a.division,
       a.brand,
       a.profit_center_name,
       a.soldto_customer_name,
       a.customer_hier_level_1,
       a.customer_hier_level_2,
       a.customer_hier_level_3,
       a.billed_qty_sc as volume_in_stat_cases
from
(select
--cal.fiscal_mnth_cd as fiscal_yearmonth_Code,
to_char(to_date(substr(cal.fiscal_mnth_cd,1,6),'YYYYMM'),'MON YYYY') as fiscal_year_month,
--substr(billing_date_code,1,6) as calendar_yearmonth_code,
to_char(to_date(substr(billing_date_code,1,6),'YYYYMM'),'MON YYYY') as calendar_year_month,
mat.division_name as division,
mat.brand_name as brand,
profit.medium_name as PROFIT_CENTER_NAME,
cust.customer_name_1 as soldto_customer_name,
cust.customer_name1_lvl_1 as customer_hier_level_1,
cust.customer_name1_lvl_2 as customer_hier_level_2,
cust.customer_name1_lvl_3 as customer_hier_level_3,
sum(billed_qty_sc) as billed_qty_sc
from clxbw.dos_etl_ship_v ship
left outer join clxbw.apo_bw_d_material mat on ship.material_num=mat.material_num
left outer join clxbw.apo_bw_d_fiscal_cal cal on cal.cal_date_code = ship.billing_date_code
left outer join clxbw.APO_BW_D_PROFITCENTER profit on ship.profit_center_code=profit.profit_center_code
left outer join clxbw.apo_bw_d_customer cust on ship.soldto_customer_code=cust.customer_code
where billing_date_code <> '20200701' --and rownum < 40
group by substr(billing_date_code,1,6),--cal.fiscal_mnth_cd
mat.division_name,
--to_char(to_date(substr(billing_date_code,1,6),'YYYYMM'),'MON YYYY'),
mat.brand_name,profit.medium_name,
to_char(to_date(substr(cal.fiscal_mnth_cd,1,6),'YYYYMM'),'MON YYYY'),--cal.fiscal_mnth_cd,
to_char(to_date(substr(cal.fiscal_mnth_cd,1,6),'YYYYMM'),'MON YYYY'),
cust.customer_name_1,
cust.customer_name1_lvl_1,
cust.customer_name1_lvl_2,
cust.customer_name1_lvl_3
order by substr(billing_date_code,1,6)) a;
